props.name: name
props.docblock: Specifies a name for the group of `SelectableBox`'es.

description.text: Specifies a name for the group of `SelectableBox`'es.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: A function that receives event of the clicked `SelectableBox` and can be used to handle the value change.

description.text: A function that receives event of the clicked `SelectableBox` and can be used to handle the value change.

props.name: type
props.docblock: Indicates the input type: checkbox or radio.

description.text: Indicates the input type: checkbox or radio.

props.name: columns
props.docblock:
Specifies number of `SelectableBox`'es in a row.

Class that is responsible for the columns number: `pgn__selectable_box-set--{columns}`.
Max number of columns: `12`.

description.text:
Specifies number of `SelectableBox`'es in a row.

Class that is responsible for the columns number: `pgn__selectable_box-set--{columns}`.
Max number of columns: `12`.

props.name: className
props.docblock: A class that is be appended to the base element.

description.text: A class that is be appended to the base element.

props.name: value
props.docblock: A value that is passed to the input tag.

description.text: A value that is passed to the input tag.

props.name: type
props.docblock: Indicates the input type: checkbox or radio.

description.text: Indicates the input type: checkbox or radio.

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: Function that is called when the `SelectableBox` is clicked.

description.text: Function that is called when the `SelectableBox` is clicked.

props.name: onFocus
props.docblock: Function that is called when the `SelectableBox` is focused.

description.text: Function that is called when the `SelectableBox` is focused.

props.name: inputHidden
props.docblock: Controls display of the input (checkbox or radio button) on the `SelectableBox`.

description.text: Controls display of the input (checkbox or radio button) on the `SelectableBox`.

props.name: isIndeterminate
props.docblock: Indicates a state for the 'checkbox' `type` when `SelectableBox` is neither checked nor unchecked.

description.text: Indicates a state for the 'checkbox' `type` when `SelectableBox` is neither checked nor unchecked.

props.name: className
props.docblock: A class that is appended to the base element.

description.text: A class that is appended to the base element.
